ValidationRule.description: Validation Rule fires when Status is changed from CS Qualified to Sales Engaged
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND(ISCHANGED(Status__c), ISPICKVAL( PRIORVALUE(Status__c) ,"CS Qualified"), OR(ISPICKVAL(Status__c, "Sales Engaged"),ISPICKVAL(Status__c, "Marketing Engaged")) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Cannot change status from CS Qualified to Sales Engaged or Marketing Engaged
